trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Newbury
There were no other sightings in Newbury on or around September 24th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was at st. helen's church in newbury, ohio on 9\24\2011 playing bingo. at approximately 8 pm i went outside with a group of people for a cigarette break. a lady that was standing next to me noticed 3 lights in the sky over the lake across the street that formed a perfect v-shape. we thought at first that it might be a tower, but realized the lights were not blinking. we watched this for about a minute and then it just faded out!
